name: Sexy Heroine! Part 2
description:
This RPG features 3 different heroines:
  • fighter
  • wizardress
  • assassin

Victoria is back, contacted by a new King in trouble!

Select one of them and embark on a quest that will take you into the depths of a dark dungeon inhabited by evil forces.
All 3 heroines have different strengths and weaknesses, so make your choice carefully. Solve riddles, unravel ancient secrets and defeat dangerous foes.
Only then you can hope to complete your quest successfully.


To move characters and the cursor, use the directional buttons on the game pad or the arrow keys on the keyboard.

  • ENTER/SPACE: Confirm, OK, Enter
  • ESC: Cancel, Menu
  • PAGE UP: Previous page
  • PAGE DOWN: Next page

If you're playing with the mouse:

  • LEFT-CLICK: Move characters, Confirm, OK, Enter
  • RIGHT-CLICK: Cancel, Menu


  • ALT+ENTER: Switches between window mode and full-screen mode.
  • ALT+F4: Forcibly exits the game.
  • F12: Forcibly returns to the title screen.
